    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceMultiSet

        public ResourceMultiSet()
        Class constructor. Initializes each stack with 19 of its respective resource.

      • ResourceMultiSet

        public ResourceMultiSet(int brick,
                int wheat,
                int ore,
                int wood,
                int sheep)
        Class constructor. Initializes each stack with the params sent in of its respective resource.
        Parameters:
        brick: - the amount of brick cards the ResourceCard has.
        wheat: - the amount of wheat cards the ResourceCard has.
        ore: - the amount of ores cards the ResourceCard has.
        wood: - the amount of woods cards the ResourceCard has.
        sheep: - the amount of sheeps cards the ResourceCard has.

      • hasResource

        public boolean hasResource(ResourceType resource)
        This method checks whether the ResourceCard has enough resources as specified in the parameter
        Parameters:
        resource: - resource is a class that has values for all five possible resources
        Pre-Conditions
        none
        Post-Conditions
        This method returns a boolean: true if the ResourceCard has the amount of resources specified, false if the ResourceCard does not have the amount of resources specified.
